CONTACT.HEADLINE: Contact
CONTACT.TEXT1: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in.

FORM.NAME: Your name is required.
FORM.AGREEMENT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_JOIN: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign contacts and categories.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_POKEDEX: Based on the pokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION_SHARKY: A 2D Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Sharky to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale and other enemies.

REFERENCES.CITATION_BASTIAN: Christina and I worked together on the 'Join' project. Her sense for clean code, design, and her attention to detail left a lasting impression on me. She is focused and noticeably strengthened our team with her solution-oriented drive. I would be happy to work with her on another project at any time.
